tool_description: This API is a fast and robust email address syntax and deliverability validator. API detects 3000+ disposable email services.
title: Email Validator

api_list.name: /email-validator/validate
api_list.description:
Validate email address. Key features:
1. Checks that an email address has the correct syntax
1. Gives friendly error messages when validation fails.
1. Checks deliverability of an email address.
1. Supports internationalized domain names and 
1. Normalizes email addresses

api_list.name: /email-validator/health
api_list.description: Return the health status of the API. Returns current UTC time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validator28.p.rapidapi.com/email-validator/health"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validator28.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
